Based on the data provided in the table, what is true about the market for pizza if the current market price is <math alttext="$10" overflow="scroll"><mtext>$10</mtext></math>?

choices.label: The supply curve will shift to the left.
The demand curve will shift to the right.
The market price for pizza will decrease.
There is a shortage of <math alttext="80" overflow="scroll"><mtext>80</mtext></math> units.
There is a surplus of <math alttext="160" overflow="scroll"><mtext>160</mtext></math> units.

content.answer: There is a shortage of <math alttext="80" overflow="scroll"><mtext>80</mtext></math> units.

topic.text: 1.6: Market Equilibrium, Disequilibrium, and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
